growthBenefits.title: Growth Benefits
growthBenefits.description: Fast setup, easy management, and minimal compliance requirements.

benefits.title: Quick Setup
benefits.description: Start your business within days without complex formalities.

benefits.title: Full Control
benefits.description: As a sole owner, make independent decisions and keep all profits.

introSection.title: Proprietorship Registration
introSection.description: A sole proprietorship is the simplest form of business ownership in India. It requires minimal legal formalities, making it an ideal option for small businesses and individual entrepreneurs.

faqSection.title: What is a Proprietorship?
faqSection.description: It is an unregistered business entity owned and managed by one individual. It doesn't require mandatory registration unless regulated by a license such as GST or Shops & Establishment.

meta.title: Partnership Registration
meta.subtitle: Form Your Partnership Firm with Ease

growthBenefits.title: Growth Benefits
growthBenefits.description: Shared responsibilities and pooled capital for better business outcomes.

benefits.title: Combined Strength
benefits.description: Leverage skills and resources of multiple partners.

benefits.title: Simple Compliance
benefits.description: Lower regulatory requirements compared to companies.

introSection.title: Partnership Registration
introSection.description: A partnership is a popular form of business where two or more individuals share ownership, responsibilities, and profits. It is governed by a Partnership Deed.

faqSection.title: What is a Partnership Firm?
faqSection.description: A business structure where two or more persons join to run a business as co-owners under a legal agreement.
